category.name: Audit Manager
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_audit_use_DefaultDateFormat
preference.preference_description: Specifies if logged dates in audit logs are displayed in DefaultDateFormat configured in timelocal_locale file. Otherwise audit logs logged dates are displayed in audit date format dd-MMM-yyyy HH:mm:ss. Valid values : true - Logged dates are in DefaultDateFormat configured in timelocal_locale. false - Logged dates are in audit date format dd-MMM-yyyy HH:mm:ss. This is the default value.
